tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: He had treated and carried out knee surgery for a sports related injury on my son few years back so we are familiar with the doctor and pleased with his friendliness and his memory to recollect my son's surgery under trying circumstances during the Chennai floods in 2015 ; he even enquired about him and his welfare !

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Hello Doctor,
Myself Syed Althaf Hussain A.
Thank you for the most wonderful treatment for my mom she is undergone HTO surgery & Meniscus Repair on her Left Knee. (March 27-2022)  The brilliant treatment deserves immense thanks and appreciation. Sending over our most humble and heartfelt thanks for your immense care and comfort during the treatment.
I recommend the doctor
Well, experienced, dedicated, soft-spoken doctor I have met ever.
I will suggest the doctor to my friends and others if any requirements for ortho medicines and surgery. 
- Syed Althaf Hussain A
  from Panruti.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The doctor quickly diagnosed and explained the possible causes for the pain and advised appropriately. Felt good.
Was genuine and explained the condition patiently.. Today was the first time i met him and yet to go on with the treatment after my sons board exams.

review: Doctor explained the reason for the pain in knee. Very friendly in his approach. Has advised medication for 5 days

review: Very thorough examination, and clear explanation of the issue. Given advice and easy to follow steps. Great doctor.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: The timing managed by the doctor is immense. He briefed in detail about the injury and treated patiently.  The follow up on the after effect was remarkable.

Good and highly satisfying. Suggested Physiotherapy treatment has to be undertaken along with prescribed medicines to see as to how I respond to it. Hopefully and ultimately my pain should get subsided. Doctor has asked me to come after a fortnight as a follow up measure

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor was very helpful in understanding the problem. He diagnosed the problem really well and suggested the right treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr.Clement Joseph was able to explain my knee issue in detail. We were able to understand the problem in an ease manner. If you need a solution to knee issue, I would recommend for 5*****

review: Very friendly , explained the causes  for the pain in a very simple way and how to get over it thank you doctor
Doctor was courteous & explained in detail, the reason for the knee pain.Satisfied with his approach.On time to the appointment.
